DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose of this study is to examine the effect of pregnenolone (PREG) on the acute psychosis-like and cognitive effects of Delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). This will be tested by pretreating healthy individuals with PREG and then assessing their responses to THC.
DOC.brief_title: Testing the Interactive Effects of Delta-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol and Pregnenolone
DOC.criteria: Exposed to cannabis at least once in lifetime. Cannabis naive Individuals with a documented reaction/allergy to Pregnenolone
